text: The "Imphal Polo Ground" (, ), originally known as "Mapal Kangjeibung" (, ), is the world's oldest polo ground, in Imphal, the metropolis of Manipur. It has its earliest recorded history of existence right from the 15th century BC (3500 years back). ==Related pages== * Hapta Kangjeibung * Manung Kangjeibung ==References== Category:Imphal Category:Polo grounds Category:15th century BC
title: Imphal Polo Ground
